content: the cursed bag pattern is intended to be used in combination with the applique faces from the following paid patterns cat face granny square frog face granny square teddy face granny square the granny square patterns containing these appliques have to be purchased separately to complete a cursed character bag what this download includes pattern for the body of the bag patterns for the limbs and tails of the characters listed above pattern for bag strap if you don t have an i-cord maker materials worsted weight yarn 4mm hook stitch marker yarn needle hot glue gun & glue sticks optional but recommended i-cord maker optional for strap
